item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Cookies What are cookies? Cookies are simple text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device by a websiteâ€™s server. Each cookie is unique to your web browser. It will contain some anonymous information. What types of cookies does this website use? Functionality cookies Functionality cookies let us operate the site in accordance with the choices you make. Our website uses cookies to remember the user’s preferred color scheme/theme.

item.title: Credits
item.description: Credits CloudCannon’s Hugo tutorial - it helped me so much to introduce myself to creating websites and to using Hugo (Hugo’s documentation is hard to understand imo)! typeface-minecraft (License) by South-Paw is the fonts package I used for one of the Minecraft fonts. Dark Mode UI by Offroaders123 is the color palette I used for all the Minecraft style buttons on my site while in dark mode. Complementary Reimagined - the shader used for my home page light mode background (Ulorium Games lobby) Overimagined Shaders - the shader used for my home page dark mode background (NoxCity) IJAMinecraft’s awesome website - my website’s style is higly inspired from it!
